headline: Eversource Energy (ES) Positions for Long-Term Growth With Utility Investments
summary: Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) is included among the Dividend Growth Stocks: 25 Aristocrats. Eversource Energy (NYSE:ES) supplies electricity, natural gas, and water to about 4.6 million customers across Connecticut, Massachusetts, and New Hampshire. As a regulated utility, its rates are set by federal and state regulators, giving the company a clear path to recover costs through routine rate […]
